info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 4:39AM CDT until August 17 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...Portions of northeast Iowa, including the following counties, Howard and Winneshiek and southeast Minnesota, including the following county, Fillmore.
* WHEN...Until 545 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 439 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Decorah, Spring Valley, Harmony, Mabel, Wykoff, Canton, Cherry Grove, Bristol, Newburg, York, Carimona, Ostrander, Harvest Farm Campground, Kendallville, Granger, Hutton, Henrytown, Lenora, Chimney Rock Campground and Bluffton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Howard, IA; Winneshiek, IA; Fillmore, MN
